reviewText:
This is one fine DVD showing some super vintage steam locomotives tacklling one of the  famous Swiss
rail lines. Excellent narration andd highly detailed photography of the mechanisms hartd a work as they tackle the grades of the Gotthard. The black and white sequencies showi g Swiss steam in service prior to their retirement were also very interesting.
Whether you are a rail fan or enjoy excellent scenery of the mountainous region of Central Switzerland,
this a "must have" DVD.
